verses.verse: And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> Build <S%H1129><s%> me here <S%H2088><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here <S%H2088><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> oxen <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had spoken; <S%H1696><s%> and Balak <S%H1111><s%> and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram. <S%H352><s%>

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Balak, <S%H1111><s%> Stand <S%H3320><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> thy burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and I will go: <S%H1980><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H7136><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me: and whatsoever <S%H1697><s%> <S%H4100><s%> he showeth <S%H7200><s%> me I will tell <S%H5046><s%> thee. And he went <S%H1980><s%> to a high place. <S%H8205><s%>

And God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> <S%H413><s%> Balaam: <S%H1109><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, I have prepared <S%H6186><s%> <S%H853><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and I have offered <S%H5927><s%> upon every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram. <S%H352><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in Balaam's <S%H1109><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and thus <S%H3541><s%> thou shalt speak. <S%H1696><s%>

And he returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> he stood <S%H5324><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> his burnt sacrifice, <S%H5930><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable, <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> hath brought <S%H5148><s%> me from <S%H4480><s%> Aram, <S%H758><s%> out of the mountains <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2042><s%> of the east, <S%H6924><s%> saying, Come, <S%H1980><s%> curse <S%H779><s%> me Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and come, <S%H1980><s%> defy <S%H2194><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> shall I curse, <S%H6895><s%> whom God <S%H410><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> cursed? <S%H6895><s%> or how <S%H4100><s%> shall I defy, <S%H2194><s%> whom the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> defied? <S%H2194><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from the top <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7218><s%> of the rocks <S%H6697><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> him, and from the hills <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1389><s%> I behold <S%H7789><s%> him: lo, <S%H2005><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> alone, <S%H910><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> can count <S%H4487><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and the number <S%H4557><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the fourth <S%H7255><s%> part of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> Let me <S%H5315><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the righteous, <S%H3477><s%> and let my last end <S%H319><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> like his! <S%H3644><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> unto me? I took <S%H3947><s%> thee to curse <S%H6895><s%> mine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> thou hast blessed them altogether. <S%H1288><s%> <S%H1288><s%>

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Must I not <S%H3808><s%> take heed <S%H8104><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> that <S%H853><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath put <S%H7760><s%> in my mouth? <S%H6310><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Come, <S%H1980><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> another <S%H312><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> from whence <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou mayest see <S%H7200><s%> them: thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> but <S%H657><s%> the utmost part <S%H7097><s%> of them, and shalt not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> them all: <S%H3605><s%> and curse <S%H6895><s%> me them from thence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And he brought <S%H3947><s%> him into the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zophim, <S%H6839><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> Stand <S%H3320><s%> here <S%H3541><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> thy burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> while I <S%H595><s%> meet <S%H7136><s%> the LORD yonder. <S%H3541><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> <S%H413><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Go again <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and say <S%H1696><s%> thus. <S%H3541><s%>

And when he came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he stood <S%H5324><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> his burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him. And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What <S%H4100><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoken? <S%H1696><s%>

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> his parable, <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Rise up, <S%H6965><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and hear; <S%H8085><s%> hearken <S%H238><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> me, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor: <S%H6834><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> that he should lie; <S%H3576><s%> neither the son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that he should repent: <S%H5162><s%> hath he <S%H1931><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> and shall he not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it? or hath he spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and shall he not <S%H3808><s%> make it good? <S%H6965><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have received <S%H3947><s%> commandment to bless: <S%H1288><s%> and he hath blessed; <S%H1288><s%> and I cannot <S%H3808><s%> reverse <S%H7725><s%> it.

He hath not <S%H3808><s%> beheld <S%H5027><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> in Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> hath he seen <S%H7200><s%> perverseness <S%H5999><s%> in Israel: <S%H3478><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> him, and the shout <S%H8643><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is among them.
God <S%H410><s%> brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> he hath as it were the strength <S%H8443><s%> of a unicorn. <S%H7214><s%>

Surely <S%H3588><s%> there is no <S%H3808><s%> enchantment <S%H5173><s%> against Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> is there any divination <S%H7081><s%> against Israel: <S%H3478><s%> according to this time <S%H6256><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> and of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> hath God <S%H410><s%> wrought! <S%H6466><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> as a great lion, <S%H3833><s%> and lift up himself <S%H5375><s%> as a young lion: <S%H738><s%> he shall not <S%H3808><s%> lie down <S%H7901><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he eat <S%H398><s%> of the prey, <S%H2964><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain. <S%H2491><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> Neither <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> curse them at all, <S%H6895><s%> <S%H6895><s%> nor <S%H1571><s%> <S%H3808><s%> bless them at all. <S%H1288><s%> <S%H1288><s%>

But Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> Told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> I thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> speaketh, <S%H1696><s%> that I must do? <S%H6213><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> Come, <S%H1980><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> I will bring <S%H3947><s%> thee unto <S%H413><s%> another <S%H312><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> it will please <S%H3474><s%> <S%H5869><s%> God <S%H430><s%> that thou mayest curse <S%H6895><s%> me them from thence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> brought <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> unto the top <S%H7218><s%> of Peor, <S%H6465><s%> that looketh <S%H8259><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jeshimon. <S%H3452><s%>

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Balak, <S%H1111><s%> Build <S%H1129><s%> me here <S%H2088><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> me here <S%H2088><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar. <S%H4196><s%>
